description.narrative: IR 1.3 EPI 2012: Children 12-23 months have increased routine immunization coverage by 5% by end of 2012., which contributes to Immunization. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 1 Children and women, particularly vulnerable and marginalized groups, benefit from integrated basic health services of high quality by end 2012

UNICEF Programmes in Pakistan (Emergencies Disaster Risk Reduction)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2019 Pakistan: Reach Every District (RED)/Reach Every Community (REC) Strategy Evaluation Pakistan (2014-18)
Pakistan 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: IR 1.3 EPI 2012: Children 12-23 months have increased routine immunization coverage by 5% by end of 2012.
